Small progress every day adds up to big results.
Positive thoughts create positive outcomes.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Dream big and dare to fail.
Your attitude determines your direction.
Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Be fearless in the pursuit of what sets your soul on fire.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
You are stronger than you think.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
Every great journey begins with a single step.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Believe in yourself, and you're halfway there.
Every day is a new opportunity to grow and improve.
Stay patient and trust your journey.
Don't count the days, make the days count.
Success doesn't come from what you do occasionally; it comes from what you do consistently.
Mistakes are proof that you are trying.
Keep going, no matter how hard it gets.
Your life is as good as your mindset.
Success starts with self-discipline.
Focus on the step in front of you, not the whole staircase.
Change your thoughts, and you change your world.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
Let your dreams be bigger than your fears.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
You can do anything you set your mind to.
Your potential is endless.
Be the reason someone smiles today.
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Life is about creating yourself, not finding yourself.
Don't stop until you're proud.
Everything you need to succeed is already within you.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Courage doesn't mean you don't get afraid; it means you don't let fear stop you.

Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
